## IEmbeddedDependenciesWebpackPluginOptions.packageFilterPredicate property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Predicate function that determines whether a package should be included in the embedded dependencies file or the generated license file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
packageFilterPredicate?: (packageJson: IPackageData, filePath: string) => boolean;
```
